com.appbrain
Interface AdService

public interface AdService

The AdService provides methods to show the AppBrain offerwall and interstitial

Author:
AppBrain

Method Summary
 boolean maybeShowInterstitial(Activity activity)
          Shows an interstitial activity sometimes.
 boolean maybeShowOfferWall(Activity activity)
          Shows the offerwall sometimes.
 void showDialog(Activity activity, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String message, java.lang.String buttonText, java.lang.Runnable runnable)
          Shows an AlertDialog with an extra button "More apps" which takes the user to the offer wall.
 void showOfferWall(Context activity)
          Shows the offer wall with the list of promoted apps.
 

Method Detail

maybeShowInterstitial

boolean maybeShowInterstitial(Activity activity)
Shows an interstitial activity sometimes.

Parameters:
activity -
Returns:
true if the interstitial was shown

maybeShowOfferWall

boolean maybeShowOfferWall(Activity activity)
Shows the offerwall sometimes. This method is useful eg. to call on a common UI element, eg a "Next" button. It only shows the offerwall after a few actions and only once every few days.

Parameters:
activity -
Returns:
true if the offerwall was shown

showDialog

void showDialog(Activity activity,
                java.lang.String title,
                java.lang.String message,
                java.lang.String buttonText,
                java.lang.Runnable runnable)
Shows an AlertDialog with an extra button "More apps" which takes the user to the offer wall.

Parameters:
activity - the current Activity
title - the title of the dialog. can be null.
message - the message of the dialog. can be null.
buttonText - the text of the first button
runnable - called after the user clicks the button. can be null

showOfferWall

void showOfferWall(Context activity)
Shows the offer wall with the list of promoted apps.

Parameters:
activity - the current Activity
